sentences.en: A ferocious battle to select a new parliamentary candidate is in progress.
sentences.cn: 推选一位新的议会候选人的激战正酣。

sentences.en: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.cn: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

sentences.en: Connie suddenly struck her as a logical candidate.
sentences.cn: 她突然想到康妮是个合适人选。

sentences.en: Four years ago, he was a write-in candidate in New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 4年前，他是新罕布什尔州一名非推荐候选人。

sentences.en: He argues that he is the true candidate of change.
sentences.cn: 他争辩说他才是真正能带来变革的候选人。

sentences.en: He is a candidate for the office of Governor.
He put up as a candidate.
He was, indubitably, the most suitable candidate.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是最合适的人选。

sentences.en: I spoke privately to the candidate after the oral.
sentences.cn: 口试后，我私下里与那位考生谈了谈。

sentences.en: It's not certain they'll accept the Front's candidate if he wins.
sentences.cn: 即便来自阵线的候选人获胜，他们能否接受他还说不准。

sentences.en: Mr Robertson would be a credible candidate.
sentences.cn: 罗伯逊先生将是可能当选的候选人之一。

sentences.en: Prime candidate to take over his job is Margaret Ramsay.
sentences.cn: 接替他工作的首要人选是玛格丽特·拉姆齐。

sentences.en: That left Mr Dertliev as the only candidate.
sentences.cn: 那使得德尔特利耶夫先生成为唯一的候选人。
这位候选人的讲话只是泛泛之谈。

sentences.en: The favoured candidate will probably emerge after private discussions.
sentences.cn: 中意的候选人很可能将在私下讨论后产生。

sentences.en: Who is the best candidate in your estimation ?
sentences.cn: 你认为谁是最合适的人选？

words.tran_cn: [法] 候选人资格；候选人的地位（等于candidacy）

phrases.tran_cn: 合格的候选人；合资格人员

trans.tran_cn: 候选人，应试者，适合…的人/物
trans.tran_en: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election
